title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC ECSTASY DEMONSTRATION / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will show you a non-verbal physiological state that is not so known that's called "ecstasy", which he achieved using Fascination - the power of the eye. In this video the subject also became cataleptic. You can learn and practice all of these powerful non-verbal techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
